Articles.Content:
How long will it be until someone makes Optimus Prime after this is released?

No idea. Right now, it\'s a fairly hacky solution, but it works well enough to be considered early release quality. Eventually I want to clean it up, but for now it will do.
So.. the aliens from War of the Worlds were Kerbals? Who knew?
Looks like that stupid steam powered spider-bot from wild wild west

Wanted to say that I\'m really enjoying the new parts pack. Cannot wait for future updates. Wanted to share some launch images from my first munar mission using your new pack. Personally wasn\'t crazy about the orange fairings, but nothing a few min. in photoshop couldn\'t fix.

Was really stable during launch, and responded well to pitch corrections. I do have a Mechjeb ASAS module on my ship, but I only use it for the orbital information window. Thanks again. ;D

@insomniac: Thanks! I think I might include those black skins of yours as an alternate pack when the next release comes around. With your permission of course.

In other news, I can\'t stop playing with these hinges:

Wanted to say that I\'m really enjoying the new parts pack. Cannot wait for future updates. Wanted to share some launch images from my first munar mission using your new pack. Personally wasn\'t crazy about the orange fairings, but nothing a few min. in photoshop couldn\'t fix.

I do have to say, that charcoal black looks spiffy.

I deem this vehicle PLAUSIBLE!

I hope he can rotate his seat to put his back to the heatshield for reentry ^^

How long will it be until someone makes Optimus Prime after this is released?

Nah.

Valkyries.
I\'m sorry, I can\'t take that seriously. Firstly, the fighter form\'s guns seem to be bigger than its engines. But more importantly, the mecha form has high heels.
That\'s because A: Its GAU-11 is a three-barrel, 55mm rotary cannon, and B: The engines are thrust-vectored, so its sole and heel are vectoring fins.

the small capsule is so cute but its says it fits three so i just thought how cramped it would have been

Was really stable during launch, and responded well to pitch corrections. I do have a Mechjeb ASAS module on my ship, but I only use it for the orbital information window. Thanks again. ;D

my SeParts are orange how i did yours get grey

Hey Nova, I just downloaded your updated pack (the Alpha 1) and noticed that the engines seem to be offset from their decouplers when building rockets, making the the engine (and everything about it) look like it\'s floating. Any chance those attachment nodes can get moved up some?

Hey Nova, I just downloaded your updated pack (the Alpha 1) and noticed that the engines seem to be offset from their decouplers when building rockets, making the the engine (and everything about it) look like it\'s floating. Any chance those attachment nodes can get moved up some?

I think this is similar to another question that was answered with this:

I made it that way so you can fit fairings around it. The fairing pieces are exactly 0.5m tall, and the distance between the lip on the orbital engine and the bottom node is exactly 1m.

the small capsule is so cute but its says it fits three so i just thought how cramped it would have been

Also my SeParts are orange how i did yours get grey

nothing a few min. in photoshop couldn\'t fix.

Wow, reading posts tends to help.

I\'m sorry, I can\'t take that seriously. Firstly, the fighter form\'s guns seem to be bigger than its engines. But more importantly, the mecha form has high heels.

I\'m quoting that as my signature if you don\'t mind

is it possible to make Prbodobodyen Core 2 back to its original size in version 4

or keep the small one and just put a bigger one

I made it that way so you can fit fairings around it. The fairing pieces are exactly 0.5m tall, and the distance between the lip on the orbital engine and the bottom node is exactly 1m.

I don\'t know if my install is somehow bugged, but this is what I\'m seeing:
You\'re using two different sizes. The larger panel would stack twice to fill in that space.

I don\'t know if my install is somehow bugged, but this is what I\'m seeing:

Don\'t use the decoupler fairings for engines. You can if you want, but there will be a gap. I\'ll add a 0.25m high piece for your construction pleasure, though =P

As usual, the problem is in my design philosophy =P

Eagerly but patiently awaiting SE2 and Probodyne 0.6
same here
O hey a new SE! Downloading now

Why are the fairings orange, anyway? The shuttle\'s ET is orange because that\'s the color of the insulation used to keep the LO2 and LH2 at the proper temperatures. It doesn\'t really make sense on fairings, since they\'re not insulating anything...it would make a lot more sense for fuel tanks to be orange...
By that logic it wouldn\'t make any more sense since the tanks don\'t hold a specified fuel type, they all hold unnamed, generic liquid fuel.

Why are the fairings orange, anyway? The shuttle\'s ET is orange because that\'s the color of the insulation used to keep the LO2 and LH2 at the proper temperatures. It doesn\'t really make sense on fairings, since they\'re not insulating anything...it would make a lot more sense for fuel tanks to be orange...

Paint. ;P

By that logic it wouldn\'t make any more sense since the tanks don\'t hold a specified fuel type, they all hold unnamed, generic liquid fuel.

Probably diesel.
